Vatican approves blessings for same-sex couples under certain conditionsThe Vatican said on Monday in a landmark ruling approved by Pope Francis that Roman Catholic priests can administer blessings to same-sex couples as long as they are not part of regular Church rituals or liturgies. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 14:10:12 GMT QO42ED5MSVJZ3KYQZC4FWF4DOU https://www.reuters.com/world/vatican-approves-blessings-same-sex- Couples-under-certain-conditions-2023-12-18/Reuters世界
Seventy nine opposition MPs suspended from Indian parliamentAt least 79 opposition lawmakers were suspended from the Indian parliament on Monday for disrupting proceedings as they demanded a government statement and a discussion on the security breach of the chambers last week. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 14:04:24 GMT NMQZORIFEVMLRAICMPI4ANPBKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/india/seventy-9-opposition-mps-suspended-indian-parliament-2023-12-18/Nigam Prusty世界印度
Unwashed and underfed, babies born into Gaza war face hardship in tentsThe grandmother has a simple wish for her twin baby granddaughters, Alma and Salma: they should be in a clean, safe room where they can be bathed. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 13:42:22 GMT 6ZIZWKOKDFKKZEO3QJQ4DRD2YI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/unwashed-underfed-babies-born-into-gaza-war-face-hardship-tents-2023-12-18/Fadi Shana, Saleh Salem世界中东
Two Navalny court hearings postponed until January - Russian court filingsTwo court hearings for jailed Russian opposition politician Alexei Navalny that were due to take place on Monday have been postponed until January, court filings showed. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 13:27:19 GMT IL7DO3IBMVP57I7PSATJCYEL4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/two-navalny-court-hearings-postponed-until-january- Russian-court-filings-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Russian held in Finland suspected of 2014-15 war crimes in UkraineA Russian man suspected of committing war crimes in Ukraine in 2014-2015 has been remanded in custody in Finland, a Finnish district court said following an arraignment hearing on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 13:25:29 GMT KSWIUV7F4VJ5HFMCCF5QXLRVMM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-held-finland-suspected-2014-15-war-crimes-ukraine-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Uganda court takes up challenge to harsh anti-gay lawUganda's Constitutional Court on Monday began hearing a challenge to an anti-LGBT law that carries the death penalty for certain same-sex acts and 20 years in prison for "promoting" homosexuality. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 13:07:38 GMT TM7TFNRLUJPH5FK6GVXA3TY464 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/uganda-court-takes-up-challenge-harsh-anti-gay-law-2023-12-18/Reuters世界非洲
Ukraine's army chief says situation at front line is not a stalemateUkraine's army chief said on Monday the situation on the front line of the war against Russian forces had not reached a stalemate. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 12:44:39 GMT VPGCRQ4Y75KKXFAIJIGSHPRWYU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-army-chief-says-situation-front-line-is-not-stalemate-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Red Sea attacks force rerouting of vessels, disrupting supply chainsMounting attacks by the Iran-aligned Yemeni Houthi militant group on ships in the Red Sea are disrupting maritime trade as leading global freight firms reroute around the Cape of Good Hope to avoid the Suez canal. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 12:24:09 GMT S2FXMVTWS5NJDN5KSZMNLFMSUU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/red-sea-attacks-force-rerouting-vessels-disrupting-supply-chains-2023-12-18/Reuters世界中东
German brigade to be combat ready in Lithuania, on Russian border, in 2027A permanent German brigade of about 4,800 soldiers in Lithuania, on the Russian border, will be combat-ready in 2027, defence ministers of both NATO members said on Monday after signing an agreement on German troops' first permanent foreign deployment since World War Two. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 12:19:48 GMT BHPSNV23GZLXVLBB5L72EJTEZY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/german-brigade-be-combat-ready-lihuania- Russian-border-2027-2023-12-18/Andrius Sytas世界欧洲
Ukrainian troops face artillery shortages, scale back some operations - commanderFrontline Ukrainian troops face shortages of artillery shells and have scaled back some military operations because of a shortfall of foreign assistance, a senior army general told Reuters. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:31:00 GMT CYIJEGMJG5K75CS3O3S5RWSKLA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-troops-face-artillery-shortages-scale-back-some-operations-commander-2023-12-18/Olena Harmash, Tom Balmforth世界欧洲
Egypt's Sisi sweeps to third term as president with 89.6% of voteAbdel Fattah al-Sisi has swept to a third, six-year term as Egypt's president, winning 89.6% of votes in an election in which he faced no serious challengers, the National Election Authority announced on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:27:56 GMT RORIJMQAIVM5XIOIPWUPTDGXAE https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/results-due-egypt-election-with-sisi-expected-sweep-third-term-2023-12-18/Farah Saafan世界非洲
